title: A2A Protocol Schema with Knowledge Graph Collaboration
description: JSON Schema for A2A Protocol, extended with Knowledge Graph query, update, and subscription features supporting GraphQL.

streaming.title: Streaming
streaming.description: Indicates if the agent supports streaming responses (e.g., tasks/sendSubscribe, knowledge/subscribe).

pushNotifications.title: PushNotifications
pushNotifications.description: Indicates if the agent supports server-sent push notifications for task updates.

stateTransitionHistory.title: Statetransitionhistory
stateTransitionHistory.description: Indicates if the agent tracks and provides task state transition history.

knowledgeGraph.title: KnowledgeGraph
knowledgeGraph.description: Indicates if the agent supports the knowledge graph collaboration methods (knowledge/query, knowledge/update, knowledge/subscribe).

knowledgeGraphQueryLanguages.title: KnowledgeGraphQueryLanguages
knowledgeGraphQueryLanguages.description: List of query languages supported for knowledge graph interactions (e.g., 'graphql', 'sparql').

url.title: Url
url.description: The endpoint URL for the agent's A2A service.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

uri.title: Uri
uri.description: URI pointing to the file content.

FileContent.title: FileContent
FileContent.description:
Represents the content of a file, either as base64 encoded bytes or a URI.

Ensures that either 'bytes' or 'uri' is provided, but not both (enforced by application logic based on Pydantic validator).

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

token.title: Token
token.description: Optional opaque token for simple authorization.

Part.title: Part
Part.description: Represents a distinct piece of content within a Message or Artifact. Use 'type' field to discriminate.

history.title: History
history.description: Sequence of messages exchanged during the task execution. May be truncated.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

historyLength.title: HistoryLength
historyLength.description: Maximum number of historical messages to include in the response. If null or 0, history is omitted.

sessionId.title: Sessionid
sessionId.description: Identifier for the session this task belongs to. Can be used to group related tasks.

message.description: The initial message initiating or continuing the task.

acceptedOutputModes.title: AcceptedOutputModes
acceptedOutputModes.description: MIME types the requesting agent accepts for output parts.

pushNotification.description: Configuration for receiving push notifications about task updates.

historyLength.title: HistoryLength
historyLength.description: Maximum number of historical messages to include in the task response. If null or 0, history is omitted.

message.description: Optional message associated with this status update (e.g., agent response, error message).

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp of when this status was recorded (ISO 8601 format).

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID of the task being updated.

final.title: Final
final.description: Indicates if this is the terminal status update for the task.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID of the task this artifact belongs to.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

KGSubject.title: KGSubject
KGSubject.description: Represents the subject of a Knowledge Graph statement.

id.title: Id
id.description: URI or unique identifier for the subject.

type.title: Type
type.description: Optional URI representing the type of the subject.

KGPredicate.title: KGPredicate
KGPredicate.description: Represents the predicate (relationship) of a Knowledge Graph statement.

id.title: Id
id.description: URI representing the type of the predicate/relationship.

KGObject.title: KGObject
KGObject.description: Represents the object of a Knowledge Graph statement, which can be another node (resource) or a literal value. Enforces that either 'id' or 'value' must be present, but not both (logic implemented in application based on Pydantic validator).

id.title: Id
id.description: URI or unique identifier if the object is a resource/node.

value.title: Value
value.description: The literal value if the object is an attribute (e.g., string, number, boolean).

type.title: Type
type.description: Optional URI representing the type of the object node (if 'id' is present) or the literal datatype (if 'value' is present, e.g., xsd:string, xsd:integer).

KGStatement.title: KGStatement
KGStatement.description: Represents a single Knowledge Graph statement (triple).

graph.title: Graph
graph.description: Optional named graph URI this statement belongs to.

certainty.title: Certainty
certainty.description: Optional certainty score (0.0 to 1.0) associated with this statement.

provenance.title: Provenance
provenance.description: Optional metadata about the source or origin of this statement (e.g., source agent ID, timestamp).

PatchOperationType.title: PatchOperationType
PatchOperationType.description: Defines the type of operation in a knowledge graph patch.

KnowledgeGraphPatch.title: KnowledgeGraphPatch
KnowledgeGraphPatch.description: Represents a single proposed change (add, remove, replace) to a knowledge graph.

queryLanguage.title: QueryLanguage
queryLanguage.description: Specifies the language of the query.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Optional dictionary of variables for the query (common in GraphQL).

taskId.title: TaskId
taskId.description: Optional ID linking this query to a specific task.

sessionId.title: SessionId
sessionId.description: Optional ID linking this query to a specific session.

requiredCertainty.title: RequiredCertainty
requiredCertainty.description: Optional minimum certainty score for results.

maxAgeSeconds.title: MaxAgeSeconds
maxAgeSeconds.description: Optional maximum age (in seconds) for the data considered.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Optional metadata, potentially including authentication tokens or alignment context.

mutations.title: Mutations
mutations.description: A list of patch operations to apply to the knowledge graph.

taskId.title: TaskId
taskId.description: Optional ID linking this update to a specific task.

sessionId.title: SessionId
sessionId.description: Optional ID linking this update to a specific session.

sourceAgentId.title: SourceAgentId
sourceAgentId.description: Optional identifier of the agent proposing the update.

justification.title: Justification
justification.description: Optional textual justification for the proposed update.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Optional metadata, potentially including authentication tokens or alignment context.

subscriptionQuery.title: SubscriptionQuery
subscriptionQuery.description: The query string for the subscription (e.g., GraphQL subscription).

queryLanguage.title: QueryLanguage
queryLanguage.description: Specifies the language of the subscription query.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Optional dictionary of variables for the subscription query.

taskId.title: TaskId
taskId.description: Optional ID linking this subscription to a specific task.

sessionId.title: SessionId
sessionId.description: Optional ID linking this subscription to a specific session.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Optional metadata, potentially including authentication tokens or alignment context.

KnowledgeQueryRequest.title: KnowledgeQueryRequest
KnowledgeQueryRequest.description: Request to query an agent's knowledge graph.

KnowledgeUpdateRequest.title: KnowledgeUpdateRequest
KnowledgeUpdateRequest.description: Request to propose updates to an agent's knowledge graph.

KnowledgeSubscribeRequest.title: KnowledgeSubscribeRequest
KnowledgeSubscribeRequest.description: Request to subscribe to changes in an agent's knowledge graph.

KnowledgeQueryResponseResult.title: KnowledgeQueryResponseResult
KnowledgeQueryResponseResult.description: Result structure for a knowledge query.

data.title: Data
data.description: The result data from the query execution, typically matching the structure requested in the GraphQL query (can be an object or array).

queryMetadata.title: QueryMetadata
queryMetadata.description: Optional metadata about the query execution (e.g., sources consulted, execution time, certainty aggregation).

KnowledgeUpdateResponseResult.title: KnowledgeUpdateResponseResult
KnowledgeUpdateResponseResult.description: Result structure for a knowledge update operation.

success.title: Success
success.description: Indicates if the update operation was accepted and applied (at least provisionally).

statementsAffected.title: StatementsAffected
statementsAffected.description: Optional count of how many statements were added or removed.

affectedIds.title: AffectedIds
affectedIds.description: Optional list of URIs or identifiers of entities created or modified by the update.

verificationStatus.title: VerificationStatus
verificationStatus.description: Optional status regarding the verification of the update against alignment rules.

verificationDetails.title: VerificationDetails
verificationDetails.description: Optional details explaining the verification status.

KnowledgeGraphChangeEvent.title: KnowledgeGraphChangeEvent
KnowledgeGraphChangeEvent.description: Represents a confirmed change event in the knowledge graph, streamed for subscriptions.

changeId.title: ChangeId
changeId.description: Unique identifier for this specific change event.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp when the change was confirmed (ISO 8601 format).

changeMetadata.title: ChangeMetadata
changeMetadata.description: Optional metadata about the confirmed change (e.g., who verified it, relation to a task).

KnowledgeSubscriptionEvent.title: KnowledgeSubscriptionEvent
KnowledgeSubscriptionEvent.description: A single event message streamed as part of a knowledge/subscribe response.

id.description: Corresponds to the ID of the original KnowledgeSubscribeRequest.

error.description: Errors can also be streamed if the subscription fails.

KnowledgeQueryError.title: KnowledgeQueryError
KnowledgeQueryError.description: Error specific to knowledge query failures.

KnowledgeUpdateError.title: KnowledgeUpdateError
KnowledgeUpdateError.description: Error specific to knowledge update failures.

message.default: Knowledge update failed (e.g., conflict, constraint violation)

KnowledgeSubscriptionError.title: KnowledgeSubscriptionError
KnowledgeSubscriptionError.description: Error specific to knowledge subscription failures.

AlignmentViolationError.title: AlignmentViolationError
AlignmentViolationError.description: Error indicating an operation violates alignment constraints.

data.description: May contain details about the specific constraint violated.

A2ARequest.title: A2ARequest
A2ARequest.description: Represents any valid A2A request message. Use 'method' field to discriminate.
